amendment.description: Amendment transfers $250,000 from the FAA's finance and management activities to the Office of Commercial Space Transportation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and then decrease funding for the FAA Operations Airport and Airway Trust Fund for commerical space transportation activities by $250,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bridenstine amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bridenstine amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Bridenstine.
